description:
Elder Scrolls Online is a MMORPG Set in the world of The elder Scrolls. Journey across the reagons of Tamriel while fighting
against various enemys

0.1.0.description:
# The First Release
### What's Included
Locations:
Main Quest Completion
Zone Quest Completion
Discovering Wayshrines

Items:
Zone Access
Progressive Main Quest

This release has a few major design issues, as such, I will be trying to get a 0.2.0 out ASAP. More Details on what is wrong and what my plans are to fix them can be found in the Discord thread

If you encounter any issues, check the FAQ and if that doesn't solve your issue ping Spencer2585 in the thread
0.1.0.title: APESO 0.1.0

0.2.0.description:
## Changes
- Added a new victory condition: final zone quest. This puts Victory behind completing the final quest in a chosen zone's story
- Added new options for the final zone quest goal
- Added new option: zone count. This allows you to limit the zones you have to do in a seed, shortening the average seed time. Zones are randomly chosen from a user-configured list
- Added support for lenux/mac computers
0.2.0.title: APESO 0.2.0

0.2.1.description:
## Changes
- Changed how the client finds the mods directory so that changes are saved across instances of the client
- Updated Client so that the tab name says ESO Client
- Client will now warn the user if the mods folder is not found when opening
- Fixed zone warning system to start teleportation to starting zone if entering a restricted zone
- Fixed zone warning system to warn user about client connection if their starting region is locked

This Update is compatible with games generated on 0.2.0
0.2.1.title: APESO 0.2.1

0.2.2.description:
## Bug Fixes
- Fixed issue with items being removed

This update is compatible with games generated on 0.2.1 and 0.2.0
only the apworld is changed from 0.2.1 so if you are updating you do not need the new mod
0.2.2.title: APESO 0.2.2
